meanings.definition: A type of edible mushroom with a thick stem and cap.
meanings.sent1: I found a boletus mushroom while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The chef used boletus mushrooms to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The boletus mushroom danced around the salad bowl, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The boletus mushroom stood tall among the other vegetables like a king in his court.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the boletus mushroom filled the kitchen, enticing everyone to try the dish.

meanings.definition: Any fungus of the genus Boletus.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with various types of boletus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the different species of boletus to understand their ecological roles.
meanings.sent3: The boletus fungi whispered secrets to each other underground.
meanings.sent4: The boletus mushrooms in the forest formed a colorful carpet on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the boletus fungi in the woods was a sight to behold.
